attributes.action: insist that Andy Burnham address Aspartame in the Food Chain and have it withdrawn from Commerical usage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the People, demand that New Health Secretary Andy Burnham immediately work to
remove Aspartame, a known and well documented exito-toxin and illegal poison, from the Food Chain, and all consumer products that contain this ingredient. We also demand he also work to remove flouride from the UK's privately-owned Water Supply forthwith. Any less action would be unacceptable
